Package siminov.web.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseEventHandler
    Handles SIMINOV FRAMEWORK DATABASE events, and redirect to application if registered for IDatabase Event.
    EventHandler
    Exposes methods to GET and SET Application Event Notifiers
    NotificationEventHandler
    It handles notification related events
    SiminovEventHandler
    Handles SIMINOV FRAMEWORK life cycle events, and redirect to application if registered for ISiminov Event.
    SyncEventHandler
    It handles all events related to Sync Event
